column21: The annual report is presented in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column22: In my opinion, the financial statements give a true and fair view of the Entityâs financial position at 31.12.2016 and of the results of its operations for the financial year 01.01.2016 - 31.12.2016.
column29: Profit for the financial year amounts to DKK 356 thousand which is in line with Managementâs expectations. For 2017 Management expects to generate positive results.
column30: Current tax payable or receivable is recognised in the balance sheet, stated as tax computed on this year's taxable income, adjusted for prepaid tax
column31: Amortisation, depreciation and impairment losses relating to property, plant and equipment comprise amortisation, depreciation and impairment losses for the financial year, calculated on the basis of the residual values and useful lives of the individual assets and impairment testing as well as gains and losses from the sale of property, plant and equipment.
column32: Cash comprises cash in hand and bank deposits.
column33: Prepayments comprise incurred costs relating to subsequent financial years. Prepayments are measured at cost.
column34: Staff costs comprise salaries and wages as well as social security contributions, pension contributions, etc for entity staff.
column35: Other external expenses include expenses relating to the Entityâs ordinary activities, including expenses for premises, stationery and office supplies, marketing costs, etc. This item also includes writedowns of receivables recognised in current assets.
column36: Other financial expenses comprise interest expenses, including interest expenses on payables to group enterprises.
column37: Receivables are measured at amortised cost, usually equalling nominal value less writedowns for bad and doubtful debts.
column38: Other financial liabilities are measured at amortised cost, which usually corresponds to nominal value.
column39: Receivables are measured at amortised cost, usually equalling nominal value less writedowns for bad and doubtful debts.
column40: Revenue from the sale of services is recognised in the income statement when delivery is made to the buyer. Revenue is recognised net of VAT, duties and sales discounts and is measured at fair value of the consideration fixed.
column41: Tax for the year, which consists of current tax for the year and changes in deferred tax, is recognised in the income statement by the portion attributable to the profit for the year and recognised directly in equity by the portion attributable to entries directly in equity.
column42: No events have occurred after the balance sheet date to this date, which would influence the evaluation of this annual report.
column43: The accounting policies applied to these financial statements are consistent with those applied last year.
column44: Share capital consists of 800 shares at DKK 100. The shares have not been divided into classes.
column51: The Executive Board have today considered and approved the annual report of Mynewsdesk ApS for the financial year 01.01.2016 - 31.12.2016.
column52: This annual report has been presented in accordance with the provisions of the Danish Financial Statements Act governing reporting class B enterprises.
column68: I recommend the annual report for adoption at the Annual General Meeting.
